en.hook: Free public Wi-Fi at the cafe — convenient but risky.

en.examples: Using non-HTTPS websites on public Wi-Fi can lead to data interception.
tips: Use a VPN to encrypt your connection.
Avoid banking or sensitive transactions on public Wi-Fi.
Prefer mobile data for sensitive tasks.
